remarks: Isomorphism H of lattice join of two atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihjat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjat.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjat.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. A ) $.
dihjat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
dihjat $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = ( ( I ` P ) .(+) ( I ` Q ) ) ) $.
